data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Mikael Lesage awards Strasbourg a goal kick.
In the minute 3, Ball goes out of play for a Lille goal kick.
Mikael Lesage signals a free kick to Lille.
Mikael Lesage awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 9, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Strasbourg have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick for Lille in the half of Strasbourg.
In the minute 11, Can Strasbourg capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Lille's half?
Strasbourg have been awarded a corner by Mikael Lesage.
In Strasbourg Strasbourg attack through Dimitri Lienard. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 13, Goal kick for Lille at Stade de la Meinau.
Mikael Lesage signals a Strasbourg throw-in in Lille's half.
Strasbourg needs to be cautious. Lille have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 17, Strasbourg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Mikael Lesage signals a free kick to Lille in their own half.
Lille advance rapidly upfield but Mikael Lesage blows for offside.
In the minute 19, It's a goal kick for the away team in Strasbourg.
Lille have a goal kick.
Goal! Zeki Celik gives Lille a 0-1 lead in Strasbourg.
In the minute 23, Corner awarded to Strasbourg.
Can Strasbourg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lille's half?
Renato Sanches for Lille gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 25, Ball goes out of play for a Strasbourg goal kick.
Corner awarded to Strasbourg.
Mohamed Simakan (Strasbourg) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 28, Goal kick for Lille at Stade de la Meinau.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Strasbourg.
Lille have a goal kick.
In the minute 33, In Strasbourg a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Corner awarded to Strasbourg.
Mikael Lesage awards Strasbourg a goal kick.
In the minute 39, Throw-in Lille.
Free kick Lille.
Free kick for Lille in the half of Strasbourg.
In the minute 42, At Stade de la Meinau, Alexander Djiku has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Strasbourg to take a throw-in in Lille territory.
Throw-in for Strasbourg at Stade de la Meinau.
In the minute 45, 1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 48, Lille have been awarded a corner by Mikael Lesage.
Strasbourg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Strasbourg.
In the minute 51, Mikael Lesage signals a throw-in for Strasbourg, close to Lille's area.
Burak Yilmaz gets his shot on target but fails to score for Lille.
Goal! Lille extend their lead to 0-2 through Renato Sanches.
In the minute 56, Lille's Renato Sanches breaks free at Stade de la Meinau. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Strasbourg.
Corner awarded to Strasbourg.
Strasbourg's Mohamed Simakan gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Mikael Lesage awards Lille a goal kick.
In the minute 58, Idriss Saadi is on a sub for Jeanricner Bellegarde for Strasbourg.
In the minute 58, Strasbourg make their first substitution with Adrien Thomasson replacing Mehdi Chahiri.
Throw-in high up the field for Strasbourg in Strasbourg.
Mikael Lesage signals a free kick to Strasbourg.
In the minute 59, Luiz Araujo (Lille) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Lille have a goal kick.
In the minute 62, Goal kick for Strasbourg at Stade de la Meinau.
Christophe Galtier (Lille) is making a first substitution, with Jonathan Ikone replacing Luiz Araujo.
Throw-in for Lille in the half of Strasbourg.
Ball goes out of play for a Lille goal kick.
In the minute 65, Ball safe as Lille is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Attention is being given to Lille’s Jonathan Ikone and play has been suspended briefly.
Lille’s Jonathan Ikone is on his feet again at Stade de la Meinau.
In the minute 68, Goal! Burak Yilmaz extends Lille's lead to 0-3.
Thierry Laurey is making the team's second substitution at Stade de la Meinau with Lucien Kevin Zohi replacing Alexander Djiku.
Throw-in for Lille in their own half.
In the minute 71, Goal kick for Lille at Stade de la Meinau.
The home team replace Dimitri Lienard with Ibrahima Sissoko.
Strasbourg have been awarded a corner by Mikael Lesage.
In the minute 73, Strasbourg have been awarded a corner by Mikael Lesage.
Mikael Lesage awards Lille a goal kick.
Xeka is replacing Benjamin Andre for Lille at Stade de la Meinau.
In the minute 74, The away team have replaced Jonathan David with Yusuf Yazici. This is the third substitution made today by Christophe Galtier.
Corner awarded to Strasbourg.
Ludovic Ajorque of Strasbourg gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 75, Lille have a goal kick.
In Strasbourg Lille drive forward through Burak Yilmaz. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Strasbourg have been awarded a corner by Mikael Lesage.
In the minute 82, Strasbourg's Adrien Thomasson breaks free at Stade de la Meinau. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Lille goal kick.
In Strasbourg a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 86, It's a goal kick for the home team in Strasbourg.
Lionel Carole is replacing Anthony Caci for the home team.
Lille awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 87, Throw-in for Strasbourg close to the penalty box.
Free kick Strasbourg.
Mikael Lesage signals a free kick to Lille.
Corner awarded to Strasbourg.
Corner awarded to Strasbourg.
2 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Renato Sanches for Lille gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Strasbourg goal kick.
Can Lille get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Strasbourg's half?
It's 0-3 as the referee blows for full-time.
Isaac Lihadji is on a sub for Jonathan Bamba for Lille.
Tim Weah is replacing Burak Yilmaz for Lille at Stade de la Meinau.
